intro: Corylopasania nhatrangensis, commonly known as the Nhatrang Corylopsis, is a flowering plant native to Vietnam. It belongs to the family Ericaceae and is characterized by its evergreen shrub form. The plant features small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. It thrives in moist, acidic soils and is often found in forested areas. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
